posts.content:
我的第一篇博客 hugo new post/FileName.md
hugo server -t pure –buildDrafts //测试静态博客
cd daydream
hugo server -t pure –buildDrafts
hugo –theme=pure –baseUrl="https://loardforwin.github.io” –buildDrafts
cd public
git add .
git commit -m “这是我的博客”
cd..
git remote add origin https://github.com/loardforwin/loardforwin.github.io.git
git push -u origin master
posts.summary: 我的第一篇博客 hugo new post/FileName.md hugo server -t pure –buildDrafts //测试静态博客 cd daydream hugo server -t pure –buildDrafts hugo –theme=pure –baseUrl="https://loardforwin.github.io” –buildDrafts cd public git add . git commit -m “这是我的博客” cd.. git remote add origin https://github.com/loardforwin/loardforwin.github.io.git git push
posts.title: Myfirst
